name: Mind Castlin
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; switch control of that monster and this card. If this Synchro Summoned card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 face-up monster on each field; switch control of those monsters. You can only use each effect of "Mind Castlin" once per turn.
